description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 11/22/2005

Eric gives Stephanie a restraining order, and tells her that the company is his again. Due to another legal technicality, Massimo has helped Eric regain control of the company. Both Stephanie and Eric call in their lawyers to fight it out. Meanwhile, Thorne expresses how glad he is to be president of the company. Taylor overhears Brooke and Ridge talking.  Taylor reveals that she knows more about the Nick/Brooke situation than everyone thought.
